login.emailOrPhoneInputError: Please enter your valid phone number or valid email address.

register.passwordInputError: Please enter a password at least 8 characters long.

home.notYetVarifiedEmail: You have not yet verified your email address. Your email address is not active until you verify it. Either click the link in the email we sent to
home.emailHasBeenSet: has been set as your email. Please check your inbox for the verification link and log in again.
home.checkYourInboxForVarification: Please check your inbox. We have sent you a verification email
home.enterVerificationCodeSentToYourEmail: Please enter the verification code we sent to your email.
home.enterVerificationCodeSentToYourPhone: Please enter the verification code we sent to your phone.
home.emailCouldNotBeVerified: Your email could not be verified. Make sure the verification code is correct.
home.phoneCouldNotBeVerified: Your phone could not be verified. Make sure the verification code is correct
home.checkYourPhoneForVerification: Please check your phone. We have sent you a verification SMS.
home.notYetVarifiedPhone: You have not yet verified your phone number. Your account (after the 1 hour grace period) is not active until you verify it. Either click the link in the sms we sent to
home.whyProvideEmailAddress: By providing an email address, you can get receipts, login alerts and other important information delivered to you to your email.
